}} 'Miguel Ãngel Cotto' (born on October 29, 1980) is a Puerto Rican
professional boxer. Cotto is a former WBA (Super) Light Middleweight Champion.
He is the younger brother of contender JosÃ© Cotto and cousin of Abner Cotto and
Carlos Cotto. He is a four-time world champion in three weight divisions (light
welterweight, welterweight and light middleweight).
